8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

<push-menu-button>

Open abstract instantiable class

Summary

The class of push buttons that appear on menus.

Superclasses

<push-menu-button>

Init-keywords

default?:
An instance of type <boolean>. Default value: #f.

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

The class of push buttons that appear on menus.

Figure 8.27 A push menu button

The default?: init-keyword sets the default value for the push menu button gadget.

Internally, this class maps into the menu item Windows control.

Operations

None.

See also

<check-menu-button>, page 540

<menu-button>, page 616

<radio-menu-button>, page 634

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
